concept: After losing 95% of revenue, founder Joseph Lee builds Supademo's first interactive demo late at night, determined to replace tiring video re-shoots with a click-through experience.

design_instructions.composition: Left 55%: founder at a desk in a small apartment, laptop open with a glowing browser window showing clickable steps. Right 45%: dark navy-to-charcoal gradient negative space, clean and empty for overlays. Strong vertical separation with soft vignette.
design_instructions.logo_placeholder: Top-right 20% area kept smooth and uncluttered, low-contrast gradient for official service logo placement (do not generate a logo).
design_instructions.title_area: Bottom-right 40% kept empty with subtle gradient only, no objects or text, to reserve space for the article title overlay.
design_instructions.lighting: Cinematic warm key light from a desk lamp on the founder's left; cool blue rim light from the laptop; right side remains dim with smooth falloff to emphasize separation.
design_instructions.texture: Slight film grain and soft vignette for documentary tone.

final_prompt: Cinematic documentary-style 16:9 thumbnail. Left 55%: founder Joseph Lee working late at a desk, laptop screen glowing with an interactive demo flow, warm desk lamp light, focused expression. Right 45%: clean dark navy-to-charcoal gradient negative space reserved for logo (top-right) and title (bottom-right), no text, no logo. Clear separation via soft vignette. Subtle film grain, high detail, storytelling mood.
